entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023
